name: Halfling Vengeance, Mass
book: Pathfinder Adventure Path #131: The Reaper's Right Hand © 2018, Paizo Inc.
target: one Small or smaller creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions like halfling vengeance, except that it affects multiple creatures.
target_zh: 每等级一个小体型或更小的生物，任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术如同半身人的复仇一样作用，除了它可以影响复数生物。
